welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crestwood, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Crestwood."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is primarily used for international flights and features duty-free shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves as a hub for low-cost carriers and offers a more budget-friendly travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
